name: Blackout (itch) (Fahrengeit)
description:
It's a sci-fi (that you won't even notice) detective game in which you have to figure out what happened to the director of your mining station on a faraway planet.

One problem, though: you started having blackouts this morning, and you don't know why. Can you be a good detective if you can't rely on your actions?

This game was made by:

Narrative – Nikita Radostev (Fahrengeit), Ilya Puchkov (reras)

Made for InkJam 2021

Super-Powered by Ink 

P.S. На русском языке можно поиграть здесь (но если у вас будут комментарии, оставляйте их под этой главной страницей)
